snippet: In another sign of a recovering housing market, the government will increase the amount that can be borrowed before loans become “jumbo” mortgages....
lead_paragraph: In another sign of a recovering housing market, the government will increase the amount that can be borrowed before loans become “jumbo” mortgages.

headline.print_headline: Limit for Government Mortgages Inches Up, Sign of a Healthier Market
headline.main: Conventional Home Mortgage Loan Limit to Rise Next Year

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
